cards.title: Recall
body: Paradox Proof
powers: Draw a Card or Shuffle a card from under this card into your deck.
incapacitatedAbilities: One player may play a card.
One hero may use a power.
One player may draw a card.

openingLines.default: Don't worry. We've already won this.

cards.title: Temporal Loop
body: At the end of your turn, go immediately to the start of {Recall}'s next turn.
At the start of your turn, {Recall} deals themselves Psychic Damage equal to the number of cards under {Recall} and move this card under {Recall}.

cards.title: Immediate Jump
body: {Recall} deals themselves Psychic Damage equal to the number of cards under {Recall}. Move this card under {Recall}.
Take a full turn now, out of turn order sequence.

cards.title: Recalled
body: When this card enters play, {Recall} deals themselves 3 Psychic Damage.
When {Recall} would be destroyed, instead restore them to 7 HP and destroy this card.
At the start of your turn, this card deals 1 target 2 Projectile Damage.
powers: This card deals 1 Target 2 Energy Damage. {Recall} deals that target 2 Energy Damage.

cards.title: Paradox Anchor
body: Reduce damage dealt by {Recall} to themselves by 1.
The first time {Recall} deals damage to a non-Hero target each turn, increase it by 1.

cards.title: Going Through The Motions
body: You may skip your Play Phase. If you do, draw a card or use a power.

cards.title: Refined Strike
powers: Deal 1 Target 1 Projectile Damage. Until the start of the next Environment turn, increase damage dealt by {Recall} to that target by 1.

flavorQuotes.text: You have no idea how many tries that shot took.

cards.title: Seen It Before
body: At the start of your turn, draw a card.
powers: Reveal the top card of a deck and put it at the top or bottom of that deck.

cards.title: Seen It Before
body: At the start of your turn, you may discard the top 3 cards of a Hero deck.
powers: Play an Equipment from any trash.

cards.title: Deja Vu
body: When this card enters play, play the top card of your trash, play the top card of your trash, and destroy this card.

flavorQuotes.text: Yes, this does seem familiar. No, this isn't the first time you've asked.

cards.title: Note to Self
body: Draw 3 Cards.
Destroy 1 card under {Recall}.

cards.title: Close The Loop
body: {Recall} deals up to 3 targets 2 Energy Damage.
Destroy 2 card under {Recall}.

flavorQuotes.text: Everything's right where it needs to be. Even that broken drone.

cards.title: Temporal Anomaly
body: {Recall} regains 2 HP.
Search your deck or trash for a Loop or Paradox and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck.

flavorQuotes.text: Everything's right where it needs to be. Even that broken drone.

promoCards.title: Recall - Unstable Jump
body: Unstable Jump
powers: {Recall} deals themselves 1 Psychic damage, increased by the number of cards under this card. If {Recall} is dealt damage this way, put the top 2 cards of your deck under this card and take a full turn now, out of turn order sequence.
incapacitatedAbilities: One player may play a card.
One hero may use a power.
One player may draw a card.

promoCards.title: Recall - Forecasted Blow
body: Forecasted Blow
powers: {Recall} deals 1 Target 1 Melee Damage, increased by the number of Cards under {Recall}.
incapacitatedAbilities: One player may play a card.
One hero may use a power.
One player may draw a card.

openingLines.default: Don't worry. We've already won this.
